title: [Large-scale] Optimized Multimedia Video Learning Strategies for Second Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners require English proficiency improvement for job enhancement and need multi-device accessibility; learning materials are provided via LMS in weekly modules.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of second language (English) content with over 80% comprehension after video-based learning
Learners can reduce learning difficulty by over 30% by applying strategies for utilizing text supports (subtitles) within videos
In the formative assessment conducted in week 4, learners achieve scores 15% higher than traditional methods when using video learning techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
